outputs.output_descr:
The umbrella programme is aiming to support China's efforts to develop the rule of law with an emphasis on human rights protection in line with international standards. 

The immediate result of the programme is:
Capacity of key legal institutions and civil society organizations strengthened to carry out and support legal reforms.

project_descr: Umbrella programme to support promotion of rule of law through institutional capacity building and legislation reforms
project_title: Umbrella programme to support promotion of rule of law
